title: Ciężarówką przez Indonezję
overview: With his eighteen-wheeled truck he has already traveled the length and breadth of the United States and Vietnam. It's time to go on another journey full of extraordinary adventures, interesting places and interesting meetings. This time, Dawid Andres will visit Indonesia. Beautiful views, dangerous mountainous routes, local culture - you will see this extraordinary country from the perspective of a Polish truck driver. Combining business with pleasure, i.e. work with traveling. Dawid invites you to a completely new, exciting journey. Where will his curiosity, his incredible openness and sense of humor lead him this time?
